D1.Weapons: Poison Gas, explosives, undetectable weapons, WMD
D1.Travellers: Visitors must contact planetary authorities by radio, landing is permitted anywhere

D2.Weapons: Portable energy weapons (except ship mounted weapons)
D2.Travellers: Visitors must report passenger manifest, landing is permitted anywhere.
D2.Psionics: All psionic powers must be registered, use of dangerous powers forbidden.

D3.Travellers: Landing only at starport or other authorised sites.
D3.Psionics: Use of telepathy restricted to government approved telepaths.

D4.Weapons: Light assault weapons and submachine guns.
D4.Psionics: Use of teleportation and clairvoyance restricted.

D5.Travellers: Citizens must register offworld travel, visitors must register all buisness.
D5.Psionics: Use of all psionic powers restricted to government psionicists.

D6.Weapons: All firearms except shotguns and stunners; carrying weapons discouraged.
D6.Travellers: Visitors discouraged, excessive contact with citizens forbidden.

D7.Information: Library programs, unfiltered data about other worlds. Free speech curtailed.
D7.Travellers: Citizens may not leave planet; visitors may not leave starport.

D8.Information: Information technology, any non-critical data from offworld, personal media.
D8.Travellers: Landing permitted only to imperial agents.

D9.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.

DA.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.

DB.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.

DC.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.

DE.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.

DF.Information: Any data from offworld. No free press.
